name: Shooooo
description:
Believe in your reaction speed? This casual game may destroy your confidence!

Just need slide your finger up, easiest addictive game in the history. Good choice for killing time.

Pay attention to your girlfriend, she may leave you because she thinks you love the game more than her.

Never play it in the subway, or the bus. I won't responsible for any late.

True king or not, you will be judged soon. Let's shoot now!

－Rule-

Slide up to shoot the target and always shoot the nearest one to the bottom. Otherwise, a new target will show up in the horizontal location as a punishment. Once a target hit the bottom you will need to start again.

A power button will be activated at a specific score. Click it can burn all cuboids.

－Feature-

Simple, addictive. Casual shoot game to kill time.

Ranking list: Challenge your friends, enjoy the game together!

Elegant interface

Amazing special effect！
